revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WZR-600 |revision=DHP2 |series=N600 |asin=B00CDJNMRY;US;,B00CDJNMRY;JP; |fcc_date=06/10/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WG9116H |manuf_rev=22 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=FDI000000013 |ic_id=6102A-050 |pcb_id=141911620005J |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM47081A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Zentel |fla1_model=A5U1GA31ATS-BC |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646E-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43228 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43217 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AirStation HighPower N600 Gigabit DualBand Wireless Router}}
"P/N: 141911620005J R01" is silkscreened on the main board.
*The 5GHz radio is using two ''[[Skyworks]]'' (''SiGe'') :[http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE5004L_DS.pdf SE5004L / 5004L] power amplifier modules.
*This device is using four ''Airgain'' antennas. :2x ''Airgain'' N2420S (2.4GHz) :2x ''Airgain'' N5x20B (5GHz)
*[http://www.amazon.co.jp/BUFFALO-AOSS2-300%E3%83%97%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B9300Mbps-%E7%84%A1%E7%B7%9ALAN%E8%A6%AA%E6%A9%9F-WZR-600DHP2/dp/B00CDJNMRY On Amazon.co.jp] (B00CDJNMRY)
===PSU=== The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is an '''Asian Power Devices''': :''APD WA-36A12U'' (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.9A max. -> 12VDC, 3A)
===See also=== *[[Buffalo WZR-600DHP2]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H22 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-900DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9116H33 (BCM47081A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1166DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117EAC22 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-1750DHP]] • [[Arcadyan]] WG9117GAC33 (BCM4708A0) *[[Buffalo WZR-D1800H]] • [[Arcadyan]] WA9116BAC33 (BCM4706)
